primary_mission: Broken Tools Phase 3 - Tool audit stabilization + runtime error reduction
scope_completed: Stabilized tools audit runner to execute package modules correctly and classify timeouts as 'slow' rather than 'broken'
Hardened Phase 3 runtime error runner to support --help/--list and skip missing legacy paths without failing
Prevented deployment verifier import-time failures by making deployer loading safe when optional dependencies are absent
Exported toolbelt symbols so toolbelt tests can import from `tools` and `tools.adapters` consistently
decisions_and_tradeoffs: Timeouts in tool audit are treated as 'slow' to avoid false negatives for IO/network tools; audit still flags syntax/import/runtime errors as 'broken'
Package-style modules under tools/* are executed via `python -m` to avoid relative-import failures when scanned as scripts
Deployment verifier uses deferred deployer loading to avoid NameError from type annotations when deployer import fails
